name: Project CARS: Complete Edition
summary:
Project CARS: Complete Edition is the ultimate choice for serious racing fans - created by gamers, tested by real racing drivers, and the preferred choice of Esports pros. Featuring all the elements of the original core experience that made Project CARS the most authentic, beautiful, intense, and technically-advanced racing game on the planet, the Complete Edition also includes an additional:

50+ cars (125 total)
4 tracks (35 unique locations, 100+ layouts total)
60+ community-created liveries
500+ features and improvements
All this, plus two special and exclusive items – the iconic Nurburgring Combined Nordschieife + GP circuit and two exclusive vehicles from Pagani – the Zonda Revolucion and Huayra BC.
